features: Professional Portable Iron: This handheld steamer boasts 1,000 watts of power, allowing for rapid heat-up in just 20 seconds. With a consistent ironing temperature of 302 degrees Fahrenheit, it offers an efficient solution for ironing your clothes in no time. The durable ceramic titanium non-stick soleplate effortlessly glides over various fabrics, ensuring convenience and ease of use.

Multifunctional Design: The steam iron features a 180-degree swivel handle, which grants you the freedom to choose the most suitable angle of use. The front of the ironing plate is crafted with a triangular tip allowing for 360-degree ironing, reaching even the most hard-to-reach areas such as buttons, lapels, and collars.

2 in 1 Steamer and Iron: The mini iron offers both steaming and ironing in one, designed for ease-of-use. Simply plug in and wait for the orange indicator light to illuminate before beginning ironing. Switch between steam and dry ironing modes by clicking the button according to your pressing needs.

Safe and Watertight: The steam iron for clothes has a 100ml/3.4 oz. water tank, making it effortless to fill and preventing any leaks. Our anti-scald system guarantees your safety by preventing accidents and avoiding scorching your clothes.

An Essential Item for Family Trips: This portable travel steamer comes with a foldable handle, which makes it compact, lightweight, and foldable, perfect for travelling and on-the-go usage. Easily eliminates creases from garments, blouses, drapes, bedding, cotton, linens, and other fabrics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Mini Steam Iron for Clothes The powerful new steam iron combines classic design with new technology to be safe and effective. Its design has many functions, including 180° folding handle, dry and wet double ironing, micro-boost technology, and anti-scalding design.

Previous page Dry/wet ironing 2 in 1 180° Rotatable Handle The rotatable handle design provides convenience for your storage and saves storage space. Rapid Wrinkle Removal 16g/min* steam volume One-touch high-temperature steam spray to deeply soften the fibres of your clothes. Comes with 100ML cup 100ML Large Water Tank Steam works continuously for up to 8 minutes, enough to iron several loads of clothes. Effective insulation Heat Insulation Base Easy to store, insulated and anti-scald Next page 1 180° Rotatable Handle 2 16g/min* steam volume 3 100ML Large Water Tank 4 Heat Insulation Base

Wet and Dry Ironing Mode Dry Ironing This professional micro steam iron is very simple and easy to use. Plug in the power plug and wait for the indicator light to turn orange to start ironing. Wet Ironing You can click the button to turn off or turn on the steam, and switch between steam and dry ironing functions to meet your different ironing needs.
The portable steam iron can be used in a variety of situations where ironing is required.

Family Travel Essentials The handheld mini steam iron is compact in design, small and light, easy to store, exquisite and stylish, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime and anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to steam items horiontally without water dripping on the item I'm steaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Helpful
reviews.reviewText: This cute little steamer takes up no space and helps with those quick wrinkle needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No leaks , light to hold. Just wish it hD a stand that came with it. Others nice stem comes out .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, steams nicely!
reviews.reviewText: Who has time to iron these days, I prefer a steamer like this one that is handy and portable. The lavender color is very pretty and would make a great gift for anyone getting a new apartment or dorm room. I have some delicate 100 year old lawn dresses that I worry about ironing and this steamer gets them wrinkle free with no water marks/spots. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got wrinkles Out Of A Blouse. Works Great...Handy & Small...!
reviews.reviewText: Usually for wrinkled clothing I wet a small towel and put the clothing in the dryer with the wet towel. I was running short on time and thought I should check out this steamer. After reading the instructions, I put the correct amount of water in the steamer. It didn't take as much water as I thought it would. After the steamer warmed up a short few mins, I was able to steam out the wrinkles... This steamer worked well beyond my expectations...!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually works good!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several handheld steamers over the years and I always get so frustrated with them not working very good and being more effort than they are worth. This little travel steamer is actually the best one I have tried so far! My husband kept saying—you need to be sure and do a review (as he watched me steaming a dress shirt for my son). Understanding it’s for travel-the water capacity is kind of small but surprisingly I only refilled water once to do his full long sleeve button up dress shirt. Would definitely recommend—great value and would be a good gift for travelers. 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this compact steam iron
reviews.reviewText: I finally got rid of my big old style iton because this tiny steam iron does the job well. I’ve had a good use of this now for a month and had no issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly suprised with this steam iron
reviews.reviewText: I picked up this steam iron since I like the small size and portability for travel. I also like that it can be used with steam or without. I have the green one - the color is a deep jade. The water well is small, so I filled it twice to steam a suit jacket, but that's too be expected for a travel iron, and it was easy to fill with the included cup. It comes with a plate to sit on, which came in very handy once the steamer was hot and I needed to place it down for a moment to change the position of the jacket. The steam is very powerful, which was not always the case with all of the steam irons I've tried. I have had a handful of steam irons in the past and most of them have not lasted very long so we'll see how this one does and I can update my review. I plan to take this with me on some upcoming trips. My only complaint is that this steam iron already had water droplets in the tank as if someone had used it and returned it. It still works but it would have been nice to receive one that hadn't been used already or that was cleaned out before it was sent out again. Nothing in the manual indicated that water should already be in the tank.
